title: Dolly Parton Sparks Health Concerns After Doctors Order Her to 'Take It Easy'
shortdescription: Icon apologizes for missing major event as fans worry about the country legend.
author: Gossip Guru

content.content: Dolly Parton shocked fans by pulling out of her own Dollywood Hall of Fame induction ceremony at the last minute â€” with doctors ordering her to 'slow down and take it easy' following undisclosed health concerns.
The 79-year-old icon released a statement saying, 'I hate letting my fans down, but my doctors say I need to rest.' Fans immediately flooded social media with prayers and well-wishes.
